summary: Ebony armor Ebony sword Daedric shield and hunting bow
descriptionHtml:
All of the weapons have modified damage sword 45 damage 40 damage on the hunting bow and i made the shield a little bit more effective 

He is located at Whiterun Bannered Mare

His Name is Vlad he will be walking around or sitting in the bannered mare it is a guy if anybody is wondering

and i coudent get any screenshots so it would be kind if u uploaded some screen shots for it

                                            Have fun with the follower
Ps i admit it is pretty op
author: baled316
